title: This unit has it all, nicely wrapped up in a cozy package.
description: Lots of natural light, high ceilings, oversized windows, architectural details, original natural wood floors, contemporary open floor plan--. this unit has it all, nicely wrapped up in a cozy package! The cozy residence stuns with its abundance of light flowing through the amazing windows that border the west wall, a feature that defines the space with breadth and design. The kitchen is an attractive, functional eating area with white cabinetry, stainless steel appliances granite counters and bar stools for casual seating. The living room, accented with high ceilings and lovely floors, feels surprisingly spacious, offering a comfortable seating and entertaining space. A dedicated, king-sized bedroom is accessed through the adjoining doorway, also accented with those amazing windows and a nice sized closet. A decorative column is a showcase of the original building and sits in a hallway that defines the entrance. A retro-designed bathroom with handsome black and white floor tiles, a tub/shower combo with a sliding glass door and white vanity with black granite counter sits conveniently off the entryway. Located in the historic district of Old City, 315 Arch is a well maintained, stately structure located across from the Quaker Meeting House and next to the Ben Franklin key sculpture and fountain park. Old City is a vibrant neighborhood, home to cultural and historic institutions, numerous cafes and restaurants, boutiques and design shops. It is a hub of public transportation with easy access within and out of the city. Truly an urban oasis for the ultimate urban lifestyle!

title: Spacious 3BR Apartment in Victorian Mansion
description:
Hi! I am renting the upstairs of my Victorian home in University city, at the corner or Melville st and Locust st, minutes walking from University of Pennsylvania.
The house has a separate entrance that leads you upstairs to a lovely, bright, and recently renovated 3BR, 1BA, attic space that can be turned into a TV room, yoga space or office. There is spacious and fully equipped kitchen, and very cozy living room/dining room. The apartment is furnished and comes with window AC units. Some furniture could be removed if needed.
There is a laundry room in the basement and shared backyard with firepit.
Hopefully the nearby restaurants will be doing more than take-out and delivery soon, because they are wonderful. Don Barriga cooks up traditional Mexican a block away. On the corner, you’ve got some of the best Ethiopian of our fair city sizzling at Abyssinia. Just above it is the gem and secret speakeasy Fiume, specializing in bluegrass bands, gypsy jazz and a remarkable collection of craft beer, bourbon and whiskey. Manakeesh, Saads, Tampopo, Taco Taco and Local 44 are also steps away.
Clark Park, with its cultural goodies and weekly farmer’s market is a pleasant stroll towards Baltimore Ave.
We are looking to rent it to 1 or 2 people max.
Utilities are shared 50-50% with the downstairs house.
The place is available for rent on August 1st. :) We ask for a background check, first, last month rent and security. In addition to full leases.
Please email me and we will schedule a zoom conversation followed by a tour of the apartment.
Looking forward to hearing from you!

title: This traditional home offers 4
description: Welcome to this beautiful single family home in the Mt. Airy West section of Philadelphia. This traditional home offers 4 beds/2baths and 3 floors worth of living space. A beautiful front yard, perfect for your favorite summer garden, as well as a back yard patio for entertaining. A bonus is the over sized garage perfect for the family cars or the ideal work space. The home also boast high ceilings, a working fireplace and brick mantle, and the area is one of Philly's main attractions. Mt. The home is conveniently located within 5 minute walking distance from both Chestnut Hill West and Chestnut Hill East train lines making your Center City commute a breeze. Buyers bring your creativity to finish up this beauty and to create the home of your dreams. The home is in need of some repairs, the 3rd floor bathroom is 25% complete, painting needed and some minor changes would make this the ideal space for any new home owner or investor. All new windows (except kitchen) installed in 2020.

description:
Korman Residential on the Main Line are beautiful apartments in Haverford, PA. We offer unique, spacious floor plan options, and whether you are looking for a MicroSuite, studio, or one-bedroom apartment, each of our rentals has hardwood floors and walk-in closets. The kitchens have fabulous cabinets and countertops with built-in appliances. You’ll love the exceptional curbside appeal. Located less than 10 miles from Center City, our rentals appeal to Philadelphia apartment shoppers. In addition to traditional residential apartments, we provide corporate and furnished options, and every one includes a long list of great amenities. Living in Haverford, PA at Korman Residential on the Main Line places you two blocks from SEPTA’s regional rail station and close to major roadways so traveling to the city and the surrounding suburbs is convenient. title: Beautiful Court Yards, Close To Train, & Restaurants
description:
Korman Residential on the Main Line are beautiful apartments in Haverford, PA. We offer unique, spacious floor plan options, and whether you are looking for a MicroSuite, studio, or one-bedroom apartment, each of our rentals has hardwood floors and walk-in closets. The kitchens have fabulous cabinets and countertops with built-in appliances. You’ll love the exceptional curbside appeal. Built in 1926, and once a hotel named Casa Del Sol, our building is listed on the National Historic Register. Our apartments for rent on the Main Line are near Villanova University and located in Lower Merion School District. Located less than 10 miles from Center City, our rentals appeal to Philadelphia apartment shoppers. In addition to traditional residential apartments, we provide corporate and furnished options, and every one includes a long list of great amenities. Living in Haverford, PA at Korman Residential on the Main Line places you two blocks from SEPTA’s regional rail station and close to major roadways so traveling to the city and the surrounding suburbs is convenient. Contact a leasing agent to schedule a personal tour of our Haverford apartments.
